import React from 'react' export default function Basket(props) { const { basketItems, onAdd, onRemove } = props; const itemsPrice = basketItems.reduce((a, c) => a + c.price_number * c.qty, 0); const shippingPrice = itemsPrice > 25 ? "Free Shipping" : 3; const shippingFreeOrNot = shippingPrice === "Free Shipping" ? 0 : 3; const totalPrice = itemsPrice + shippingFreeOrNot; return (

Basket Items

{basketItems.length === 0 &&
Basket is empty.
}
{basketItems.map((item) => (
{item.name}
{item.qty} x {item.price_number.toFixed(2)}
))} {basketItems.length !== 0 && ( <>
Items Price:
{itemsPrice.toFixed(2)}
Shipping Costs
{shippingPrice.toFixed(2)}
Total Costs
{totalPrice.toFixed(2)}
)}
) }
